segments.text: My gaze shifts to the center-left of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy, quite young, engaged in some serious mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's climbing on a two-step stool, which looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs are splayed, and it appears to be tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched upward towards an open wall cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside the cabinet, I can clearly see a large jar labeled "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of his hands is already deep inside the jar, grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With his other hand, he's holding a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit treasures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl stands nearby, looking up at him expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is raised, palm open, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their daring little plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a perfectly coordinated, silent operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I'm also incredibly nervous about that stool; it looks like it could go any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on the cookies, they don't even seem to notice its wobble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene is a powder keg of potential events.
segments.speaker: PAR
